name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cardell PETERKIN, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cardell PETERKIN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Eugene H. Clarke, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Lee M. Kaplan, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
398 A.2d 655
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Cardell PETERKIN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 9, 1979.
Decided March 14, 1979.
Eugene H. Clarke, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Lee M. Kaplan, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
